name: alfred-lifestyle-manager
description: Alfred - A comprehensive lifestyle management application for time, energy, tasks, and life organization

scripts.build:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd client && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.deploy:heroku: npm run build:all && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy to Heroku' && git push heroku main
